meaning_str.bing:
v. 学习；学会；得知；获悉
网络. 知道；了解；记住

学；学习；学会；学到；习得；了解；获悉；熟悉；记住；记忆；熟记；背熟；发现；使知晓；领会

sogou-CET4.v: 学习[出现182次)];听说; 获悉[出现63次)];教训[出现1次)];记住[出现1次)]

sogou-gaokao.v: 学习[出现3次)];听说; 获悉[出现3次)];开始醒悟; 开始明白[出现3次)];记住; 记[出现0次)]

sogou-zhongkao.v: 学习[出现950次)];吸取教训; 认识到[出现65次)];得知; 获悉[出现43次)]

1.en: And you can learn too from last years problem sets and quizzes if used as a check or corrective when you seem to have hit a dead end.
1.cn: 当你似乎走到一条死胡同的时候，可以用过去几年的习题或考古题做为检核或改正的参考。

2.en: I knows that I cannot make troubles with you, so learn to be independent, learn to look after myself.
2.cn: 女儿深知不能再跟你们添麻烦，所以学着独立，学着自己照顾自己了。

3.en: If you just read a little here and memorize a few words there, it's like the blind feeling an elephant, you'll never learn English well.
3.cn: 像你这样东读一点，西背一点地记单词，就像盲人摸象，是学不好英语的。

0.en: We've all had bad days, but we learn, and we stick together.
0.cn: 我们都有过不顺心的时候，但总能学着生存，而且非常团结。

1.en: No, you learn these things. You grow into it.
1.cn: 不，这些是要学习的，你会逐渐学会的。

2.en: Learn all you can about them and report back.
2.cn: 学习你们能学到的关于他们的一切，回来做报告。

3.en: If you're prepare to adapt and learn, you can transform.
3.cn: 只要你准备好适应并学习，你就可以逆转。

4.en: You know, I'm really glad you decided to learn mandarin.
4.cn: 你知道，我真的很高兴你决定学习普通话。

5.en: And from now on, I was going to somehow learn how to get it.
5.cn: 从此，我开始学习如何抓住它。

6.en: Yes. But you yourself admit the software will learn. So there must be something to be learned.
6.cn: 是的，可是你自己承认，这款软件还需要学习，也就是说，它还有东西需要学习。

7.en: And your brain is designed to learn a language through conversation.
7.cn: 你的大脑天生就是要用对话学习语言。

8.en: Where'd you get the nice locket? Shh, I come here to learn.
8.cn: 你这漂亮的吊坠是从哪儿弄的？嘘，我是来学习的。

9.en: Good morning and welcome to World History. Who's ready to learn?
9.cn: 早上好，欢迎来上世界历史课，准备好学习了吗？

10.en: I'm not trying to trick you, Mr. Ephraham. If the software learns, then it must not know what it needs to learn, right?
10.cn: 我不是给你挖坑，以法连先生，如果软件在学习，也就是说它并不知道自己要学习什么，对吗？

11.en: Thank you, everyone, for staying late to learn our new iPad order system.
11.cn: 感谢大家关门后特意留下来学习新的iPad点餐系统。

12.en: Thanks, Riley, you're right. I'm gonna try to learn everything I can about this.
12.cn: 谢谢你，莱丽，你是对的，我会尽我所能去学习一切。

13.en: Here are the labs where students learn to design and build the doors to the human world.
13.cn: 这是实验室，学生会学习设计和建造通往人类世界的门。

14.en: I really want a kid. And when that day finally comes, I'll learn how to be a good dad.
14.cn: 我很想要孩子，有了孩子以后，我会学习如何做是个好爸爸。

15.en: The knife, for example, is the last thing you learn. Okay? Okay. Position.
15.cn: 拿刀来举个例子，刀是你要学习的最后一件武器，明白吗？好的。找位置。

16.en: Find yours. Find yours. Learn from each other. Otherwise, we don't stand a chance.
16.cn: 找出你的故事。互相学习。,否则我们就浪费了这次机会。

17.en: Everyone here is very different. So many many things to learn. Always very little sleep.
17.cn: 这里有各种各样的人，要学习的东西也太多太多，但睡眠又太少太少。

18.en: And if you refuse to learn that, I guarantee you, you guys will not become the best person you can be.
18.cn: 如果你拒绝学习历史，我保证你们一定无法做到最好的自己。

19.en: If you've never tried surfing, pack your board-shorts, this is the place to learn.
19.cn: 如果您从来没有试过冲浪，就快快收拾好装备，来个这个冲浪好去处学习吧。
